Class RentalManagementTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.testing.app.RentalManagementTest

  • public class RentalManagementTest
extends java.lang.Object

    JUnit test class for RentalManagement

    Author:
    Jonathan Carlton

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RentalManagementTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void availableCars()
      Test that there are the correct number of available cars in the car rental system.
      void getCar()
      Test that the car which is rented in the setUp() is fetchable, given the Person.
      void getRentedCars()
      Test that the correct number of cars currently rented is return.
      void issueCar()
      Test that you are able to successful issue a large car to a person.
      void issueCarNullParameters()
      Test that when null parameters are passed to the method that it throws an IllegalArgumentException
      void issueCarReturnFalseCases()
      Test that the false is returned by the method in the various different scenarios listed in the method description.
      void populateMapTest()
      Passes this test.
      void setUp()
      Setup the test objects
      void terminateRental()
      Test that the termination of a rental agreement is working correctly.
      void terminateRentalNullParameter()
      Test that a IllegalArgumentException is thrown when a null parameter is passed to the method
